title: 1_Click_PSP_v2_ Beta.rar
description:
1 Click PSP version 2 Beta is a application I wrote that will automatically install one or all of the included applications onto the SLIM OR PHAT PSP\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;s with Custom Fiirmware 3.80m33-5 or 3.90m33-2. The user doesnt have to Drag and Drop , or cut and paste files manually except for FLASH0 directory files needed. 

Once you have downloaded the 1_Click_PSP_v2.exe: 

1. Run the EXE and \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"In the first pop-up window \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"READ THE INSTRUCTIONS\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" !
2. Complete STEP 1 THRU STEP 4
3. Complete the installation 
4. Double Click the RUN_ME_FIRST.BAT. 

Follow the prompt options for which Custom Firmware and Type PSP you are using. Slim & Phat PSP\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;s are supported with either CFW 3.80m33-5 & 3.90m33-2.

Sit back and watch 1 Click PSP install all the folders, files and documents onto your PSP without you touching a single thing.

Included Applications
1. IRSHELL 3.90 w/ patches
2. Quick Flasher v2 w/ Themes
3. Popsloader Plugin for 3.90m33-2
4. gpSP Emulator
5. Snes Emulator
6. RemoteJoy w/ nethostfs.exe
